eventName: So Long, Adele: Home Away From Home
storyInfo: Trying to find out where the letter came from, Eyjafjalla is knocked out when she accidentally runs head-first into Enis. When she wakes up, she begins to write a response. Enis learns about the seriousness of Oripathy development.

attributes.content: Where should we go today? We've been banned from swimming in the hot springs... how about we get a few more guys and play hide-and-seek in that plate?
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: Enis said we shouldn't go to the shore. I want to go to the volcano museum again. We couldn't find Dad the last time.
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: No point, you won't find him... hey, where's Enis working today?
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: It's Wednesday. He should be at Mr. Tom's shop in the afternoon.
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: The drinks shop!
attributes.name: Boy & Girl

attributes.content: Chocolate.
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: Strawberry.
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: Alright, alright.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Hey, is that a new flavor? What does cake-flavored ice cream taste like? Can we have one?
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: Tom says only one scoop per kid per day.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: But you don't eat ice cream. Can we have yours?
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: Don't be like that... Enis is always working hard...
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: I'm not a kid anymore.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: But it's so hot today. There's less than one scoop left by the time the ice cream reaches your mouth. It's not fair.
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: Yeah, what should we do?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: It's so hot today. Cake-flavored ice cream sounds great, doesn't it?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: (Expectant look)
attributes.name: Boy & Girl

attributes.content: Alright, you can have one more scoop... but only if you promise to be back home by dinner, and help Harley set the table.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Okay—
attributes.name: Boy & Girl

attributes.content: You say that every time. Let's hope you still have appetite by dinner.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: An ice cream cone floats by the little girl. She stares in amazement as a piece of ice cream melts in the midday sun.
The strawberry-flavored ice cream drops, forming a puddle on the ground. The invisible creature steps on it, leaving behind its footprints.
...Huh?
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: I think an ice cream just ran away.
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: Ice cream? Ran away?
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: I think it was strawberry too.
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: Does that mean we get another scoop if we catch it?
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: One ice cream, please.
attributes.name: Byrd

attributes.content: Three gold certificates.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: No freebies?
attributes.name: Byrd

attributes.content: We're a business here, ma'am, not a charity.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Coffee flavor, then.
attributes.name: Byrd

attributes.content: Thank you for your business.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Surprised to see foreign visitors at a time like this.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Maybe you underestimate the charm of this place.
attributes.name: Byrd

attributes.content: Why aren't you enjoying the summer? Back home, kids your age are hanging out on the streets, having fun.
attributes.name: Byrd

attributes.content: It's hard to be the big brother, I guess?
attributes.name: Byrd

attributes.content: Got to make a living.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Do you know any instruments?
attributes.name: Byrd

attributes.content: Instruments? I didn't even take singing lessons...
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Does a kalimba count?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: I think you'd go well with a saxophone.
attributes.name: Byrd

attributes.content: Doesn't sound like I could afford it.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: I'm in a good mood because I found a new job. Will you have a chat with me if I buy you a drink?
attributes.name: Byrd

attributes.content: Sorry, but I have to get to my next job.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Come to my family's shop if you want to chat.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: You mean the logistics hub will help me sell my wares to other countries?
attributes.name: Fragrance Shop Owner

attributes.content: Not only that, buying will be easier as well. You'll be able to procure fresh ingredients straight from the producers, for example.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Hm... that doesn't sound too bad.
attributes.name: Fragrance Shop Owner

attributes.content: Will you accept relocation, then? And can MountainDash Logistics expect your vote in the upcoming public opinion survey?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Sure.
attributes.name: Fragrance Shop Owner

attributes.content: R-Really?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: I was planning to move to the city center anyway. Being able to buy Victorian clothes more easily sounds appealing.
attributes.name: Fragrance Shop Owner

attributes.content: Thank you for your support! I won't take up any more of your time.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: No rush. Don't you want to learn more about my fragrances?
attributes.name: Fragrance Shop Owner

attributes.content: I know just the right ones for a cute boy like you.
attributes.name: Fragrance Shop Owner

attributes.content: O-Okay...
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Hey, kid.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Emperor! Are you here on vacation too?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Vacation's a state of mind, and I'm on vacation every day. Who'd stay in an ordinary place in a summer like this, though?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Naw, that's all secondary. I'm here to take back what's mine!
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Those dumbass sheep stole my favorite album! The one that won me the gold, first time I hit the Obsidian Festival! Serial number 000001!
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Sure, Dolly's in a real small club of entities I can actually talk music with, but I gotta give him a piece of my mind for lettin' his clones run wild in this world!
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: He really think his kids can hit the soul the way my music can?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Er... excuse me? Who's Dolly?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Man, forget it. I'm talkin' a conflict beyond mortal comprehension here. Anyway, what's got you hangin' around these parts?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: And what's that smell on you? Like you rolled yourself in a Sargonian rainforest mud puddle three times, then fell into the champagne tower at a cocktail party.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: ...That bad?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: MountainDash Logistics wants the rebuilding project for this commercial district, but we have competition.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Aw, you playin' a game of turf war here.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Where's Eurill? He just dump all his work on you and run off on vacation?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: I wouldn't put it that way...
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Mmhm. Anyway, good luck, kid. Maybe swipe the stock he holdin' when his back's turned. Give him a little summer surprise.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Then maybe we'll have somethin' to talk about next time I see him at a party.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Oh, hold the conversation. Think I saw—two sheep! Hey, gimme back my album!
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Sheep?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: (Is the Little Black Sheep still here?)
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: (It's slow, it couldn't have gone far...)
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Huh? The old sign over there, too...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: You ate the address on the envelope, didn't you?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: The furry creature wanders down the street, eating street sign after street sign.
Little Black Sheep... wait!
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Did you eat the envelope from that letter to the museum?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Little Black Sheep!
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Passersby turn around to look at the girl, who is crying out frantically while chasing empty air.
She hardly has time to care for appearances as she huffs and pants, almost tripping over herself.
Little Black Sheep! Wait!
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Finally done with this batch... really got to be more careful about asking someone to take my shift. I paid him good money only for him to make so many mistakes... what's the next place?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Hey, where did the address on the envelope go? Did someone tear it off?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: What's that?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: What happened to the addresses? I go out for a minute, and now they're all gone?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Good thing I have the records on the terminal... but seriously, what a bother?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Me and my rotten luck...
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Well, I guess there's nothing to do but check one by one... the next shift is almost here. Better hurry...
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Run, Enis, run... run and make your dough...
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Take care of your siblings...
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Look out! I can't stop with so much stuff on me!
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Hey!
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Whoa!
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Ugh—
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Ugh... my leg...
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Hey, you okay?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Are you alright? Wake up!
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: D-Doctor...
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Is there a doctor around here?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: When are you going to get proper treatment, Enis?
attributes.name: Serious Voice

attributes.content: I... I'll go with you to Rhodes Island once I'm done with this... my family can't do without...
attributes.name: Hushed Voice

attributes.content: A doctor shouldn't be hiding the identity of a patient. I understand your difficulties, but being responsible to your family means being responsible to your own health.
attributes.name: Serious Voice

attributes.content: I-I know what to do...
attributes.name: Hushed Voice

attributes.content: Dr. Ceylon... all Oripathy patients eventually die, don't they?
attributes.name: Hushed Voice

attributes.content: All of us eventually die, Oripathy or not. The end is simply clearer for people with Oripathy.
attributes.name: Serious Voice

attributes.content: What eventually happens to people with Oripathy?
attributes.name: Hushed Voice

attributes.content: The symptoms exhibited by late-stage Oripathy patients may differ depending on the location of the condition.
attributes.name: Serious Voice

attributes.content: For example, Oripathy has damaged the hearing of the girl that you brought. She is almost completely deaf without a hearing aid.
attributes.name: Serious Voice

attributes.content: I hate to say it, but your Originium crystal formation is near your heart, and it can be life-threatening if not managed properly.
attributes.name: Serious Voice

attributes.content: Well, at least that means I'll have all my faculties until I die.
attributes.name: Hushed Voice

attributes.content: Say that again, and I'll deliver you to Rhodes Island by force right now.
attributes.name: Serious Voice

attributes.content: Just kidding... thanks, Dr. Ceylon.
attributes.name: Hushed Voice

attributes.content: Here's the money for both of us... I'll be going.
attributes.name: Hushed Voice

attributes.content: Bye.
attributes.name: Hushed Voice

attributes.content: The sun casts its rays on the bed. Adele slowly opens her eyes to the sound of muffled conversation.
You're awake. How are you feeling?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: You were knocked out after bumping into someone on the street. The young man brought you here and left behind all the money he had. Said it was for your medical bills.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: You must be careful, Eyjafjalla.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: The reason you passed out was low blood sugar, but I gave you a physical anyway, and I'm sure you can read the data about your Oripathy yourself...
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Thank you, Dr. Ceylon. I'm feeling fine now. Can I go?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: You're staying here for the rest of the afternoon. No going anywhere.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: I have a few patients to visit. You stay put. Rhodes Island will hear if you're not here when I get back.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Guess I lost it...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: What was the Little Black Sheep trying to tell me?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Adele sits up on the bed. The photo falls out of her pocket.
'How have you been? I'm doing fine here.'
'It's been a long time. I miss you.'
I'm fine...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: How are you?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Vati, Mutti, in a few years, I'll be the same age you were when I was born.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: What was life like for you, at the time?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Thank you so much for...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Drip, drop.
Tears fall on the paper.
Adele stops writing and crosses out what she had written down.
Shift's about to start. Where are you? There's a lot of stuff to move.
attributes.name: Impatient Voice

attributes.content: Almost there, almost there!
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Mr. Enis, the hot springs hotel shop that you asked about is now available for purchase.
attributes.name: Polite Voice

attributes.content: You will need to pay a deposit before the end of the month if you're still interested...
attributes.name: Polite Voice

attributes.content: Before the end of the month? Alright, I'll get back to you...
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Enis, are your brother and sister with you?
attributes.name: Worried Voice

attributes.content: Brother and sister?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: It's almost dinner time, and they're not back yet. Tell them to come back soon.
attributes.name: Worried Voice

attributes.content: I, I... alright!
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Dagnabbit!
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: This, stupid, car—
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Frickin hell! Consarnit!
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Er... are you okay?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: *Pant*—*pant*—
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: What are you doing here?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Talking a walk.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I followed the tourist guide's recommended route, but the shops listed aren't any different from those in Lungmen, so I was about to go back.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Were you picking a fight with this pickup truck?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: The engine's old. Igniter doesn't work well.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Let me take a look.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Someone's blocked the vent with a ball of paper. Who could have done it? Let's see... a flyer?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Must be some kid's practical joke...
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Well, I've got to be on my way. Thanks!
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: One moment.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: The mark on that box on the passenger seat, and on the flyer. It's Rhodes Island Pharmaceuticals, isn't it?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Er...
attributes.name: Enis
